unnormalised: So, I tried a mental health app after watching "Dear Zindagi", you know, that SRK film. Honestly, after a stressful week managing my chachi's wedding prep in Delhi and juggling work, I felt drained. It's like I needed Dr. Jehangir Khan's insights! The app helped a bit, but finding a good therapist in India, even online, is tough! AIIMS has great resources, though, I hear.
normalised: So, I tried a mental health app after watching "Dear Zindagi", you know, that S R K film. Honestly, after a stressful week managing my chachi's wedding prep in Delhi and juggling work, I felt drained. It's like I needed Doctor Jehangir Khan's insights! The app helped a bit, but finding a good therapist in India, even online, is tough! A I I M S has great resources, though, I hear.
